description: Get a list of trending social categories.

changes.description: Introducing new categories endpoint to get the current list of trending social categories.

description: Get the top creators for a social category

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the category to get details for. A category must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, and spaces.

changes.description: Introducing new category creators endpoint to get the top creators for a social category.

description: Get the top news posts for a category. Top news is determined by the metrics related to the social posts that mention the news posts.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the category to get details for. A category must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, and spaces.

changes.description: Introducing new category news endpoint to get the top news posts for a category.

description: Get the top posts for a social topic. If start time is provided the result will be the top posts by interactions for the time range. If start is not provided it will be the most recent top posts by interactions from the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the category to get details for. A category must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, and spaces.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to start at. Will be rounded to the beginning of the day. If the end parameter is not provided it will just be the top posts for this day.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: (Optional) The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at. Will be rounded to the end of the day.

changes.description: Introducing new category news endpoint to get the top news posts for a category.

description: Get historical time series data for a social category

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the category to get details for. A category must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, and spaces.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new category time series endpoint to get time series metrics for a social category.

description: Get the top topics for a social category

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $.

changes.description: Introducing new category topics endpoint to get the most popular topics within a social category.

description: Get summary information for a social topic

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Provide the category to get details for. A category must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, and spaces

changes.description: Introducing new category detail endpoint to get details for a specific social category.

description: Get meta information for a cryptocurrency project. This includes information such as the website, social media links, and other information.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the coin or token.

changes.description: New meta information endpoint for coins to get more detailed information about a cryptocurrency.

description: Get market time series data on a coin or token. Specify the coin to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the coin in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /coins/list endpoint.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the coin or token.

changes.description: The coins endpoint provides the current market data for a crypto asset. Social data has been removed and is available using other endpoints.

description: Get market time series data on a coin or token. Specify the coin to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the coin in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /coins/list endpoint.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the coin or token.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new coin time series endpoint v2 that includes market and social data combined.

description: Get market data on a coin or token. Specify the coin to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the coin in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /coins/list endpoint.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the coin or token.

changes.description: The coins endpoint provides the current market data for a crypto asset. Social data has been removed and is available using other endpoints

description: Lists all coins and tokens supported by LunarCrush. Includes the "topic" endpoint to use to get social data from this asset as a social topic.

changes.description: Includes the topic to use when looking up social data for this asset as a social topic

description: Get a general snapshot of LunarCrush metrics on the entire list of tracked coins. It is designed as a lightweight mechanism for monitoring the universe of available assets, either in aggregate or relative to each other. Metrics include Galaxy Score™, AltRank™, price, volatility, 24h percent change, market cap, social mentions, social interactions, social contributors, social dominance, and categories.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort the output by metric

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: filter by sub categories / sector from the "categories" key. Separate by commas for multiple matches. Available sectors can be found on the sector filters at https://lunarcrush.com/categories/cryptocurrencies

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the number of results. Default is 10 maximum is 100 per page.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Pass any value as desc and the output will be reversed (descending)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: When using limit, set the page of results to display, pages start at 0

changes.description: v2 includes market and social data with options to sort and limit by metrics
Logos now available for each entry
Blockchain and contract address info for assets to help clearly identify the asset on chain
Includes the topic to use when looking up social data for this nft collection as a social topic
Includes sentiment data
Added filter option to filter the results by specific sub categories/sectors. Try "meme" for example.

description: Get the top posts for a specific creator.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network for the creator. One of twitter, youtube, instagram, reddit, or tiktok

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID or screen name of the creator

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to start at. Will be rounded to the beginning of the day. If the end parameter is not provided it will just be the top posts for this day.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: (Optional) The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at. Will be rounded to the end of the day.

changes.description: Introducing new creator posts endpoint to get the top social posts and details for a specific creator.
Sentiment is now included in the post object.
Post output now includes a link to the original post as key "post_link".
Start and end parameters added so you can fetch the top posts for a specific day or a range of days.

description: Get time series data on a creator.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Influencer social network

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id or screen name of the creator

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new creator time series endpoint.

description: Get detail information on a specific creator

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Provide the network for the creator. One of twitter, youtube, instagram, reddit, or tiktok

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Provide the unique ID or screen name of the creator

changes.description: Introducing new creator detail endpoint to get details for a specific creator.

description: Get a list of trending social creators over all of social based on interactions. To get lists of creators by category or topic see the topics and categories endpoints.

changes.description: Introducing new creators endpoint to get the current list of trending social creators.

description: Get market time series data on an nft collection. Specify the nft to be queried by providing the numeric ID or slug of the nft collection in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /public/nfts/list endpoint.

parameters.name: nft
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the nft collection.

changes.description: The nfts endpoint provides the current market data for an nft collection. Social data has been removed and is available using the public/topic endpoints.

description: Get market time series data on a nft. Specify the nft to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the nft in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /nfts/list endpoint.

parameters.name: nft
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the nft or token.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new nft time series endpoint v2 that includes market and social data combined.

description: Get market data on an nft collection. Specify the nft to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the slug of the nft in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /public/nfts/list endpoint.

parameters.name: nft
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or slug of the nft.

changes.description: The nfts endpoint provides the current market data for an nft collection. Social data has been removed and is available using the public/topic endpoints.

description: Lists all nft collections supported by LunarCrush. Includes the "topic" endpoint to use to get social data from this nft collection as a social topic.

changes.description: Includes the topic to use when looking up social data for this nft collection as a social topic

description: Get a general snapshot of LunarCrush metrics on the entire list of tracked NFTS. It is designed as a lightweight mechanism for monitoring the universe of available assets, either in aggregate or relative to each other. Metrics include Galaxy Score™, AltRank™, floor price, 24h percent change, market cap, social mentions, social interactions, social contributors, social dominance, and categories.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort the output by metric

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the number of results. Default is 10 maximum is 100 per page.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Pass any value as desc and the output will be reversed (descending)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: When using limit, set the page of results to display, pages start at 0

changes.description: v2 includes market and social data with options to sort and limit by metrics
Logos now available for each entry

description: Get interactions over time for a post. If a post is older than 365 days the time series will be returned as daily interactions, otherwise it hourly interactions

parameters.name: post_type
parameters.description: The post type e.g. tweet, youtube-video, tiktok-video, reddit-post, instagram-post

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: The unique id of a post, for twitter it is a number, youtube it is the id in the url after watch?v=, look in the url for the unique id

changes.description: Introduced the post time series endpoint to get the full time series of interactions for a single post

description: Get details of a post

parameters.name: post_type
parameters.description: The post type e.g. tweet, youtube-video, tiktok-video, reddit-post, instagram-post

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: The unique id of a post, for twitter it is a number, youtube it is the id in the url after watch?v=, look in the url for the unique id

changes.description: Introducing the post detail endpoint to get details of a single post

description: See the summary output of a custom search aggregation.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The ID of the custom search aggregation to view.

changes.description: New searches/:slug endpoint added to fetch the latest data in a custom search aggregation.

description: Delete a custom search aggregations.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The ID of the custom search aggregation to delete.

changes.description: New searches/:slug/delete endpoint added to allow the deletion of custom search aggregations.

description: Update a custom search aggregation name or priority. Search terms and configuration cannot be changed once created.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The ID of the custom search aggregation to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the custom search aggregation.

parameters.name: search_json
parameters.description: A JSON object (stringified) that defines the search criteria for the custom search aggregation. Search terms and configuration cannot be changed once created. Posts that match any of the search term will be included. For each search term there are optional inclusion and exclusion terms to help fine tune the results.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Define if this is a high priority search aggregation. Pro accounts get up to 10 high priority search aggregations at a time.

changes.description: Updating the search criteria on a custom search aggregation is now supported.
New searches/:slug/update endpoint added to allow renaming and adjusting priority of custom search aggregations.

description: Create a custom search aggregation of topics and search terms. Fine tune the posts that get included or excluded. Search terms and configuration cannot be changed once created. If successful returns the new id/slug and the processed search config. Note that search terms will be adjusted and simplified for optimized search and matching.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the custom search aggregation.

parameters.name: search_json
parameters.description: A JSON object (stringified) that defines the search criteria for the custom search aggregation. Search terms and configuration cannot be changed once created. Posts that match any of the search term will be included. For each search term there are optional inclusion and exclusion terms to help fine tune the results.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Flag as a high priority search aggregation. Pro accounts get up to 10 high priority search aggregations at a time.

changes.description: New searches/create endpoint added to allow the creation of custom search aggregations.

description: List all custom search aggregations.

changes.description: New searches/list endpoint added to fetch a list of all custom search aggregations.

description: Get recently popular social posts matching a single search term or phrase. Optionally configure and test a custom search configuration.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Test a single search term or phrase

parameters.name: search_json
parameters.description: A JSON object (stringified) that defines the search criteria for the custom search aggregation. Posts that match any of the search term will be included. For each search term there are optional inclusion and exclusion terms to help fine tune the results.

changes.description: New searches/search endpoint added to test a search configuration against matching posts.

description: Get market time series data on a stock. Specify the stock to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the stock in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /stocks/list endpoint.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the stock.

changes.description: The stock endpoint provides the current market data for a stock. Social data has been removed and is available using other endpoints.

description: Get market time series data on a stock. Specify the stock to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the stock in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /stocks/list endpoint.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the stock or token.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new stock time series endpoint v2 that includes market and social data combined.

description: Get market data on a stock. Specify the coin to be queried by providing the numeric ID or the symbol of the coin in the input parameter, which can be found by calling the /coins/list endpoint.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: provide the numeric id or symbol of the stock.

changes.description: The coins endpoint provides the current market data for a stock. Social data has been removed and is available using other endpoints

description: Lists all stocks supported by LunarCrush. Includes the "topic" endpoint to use to get social data from this asset as a social topic.

changes.description: Includes the topic to use when looking up social data for this asset as a social topic

description: Get a general snapshot of LunarCrush metrics on the entire list of tracked stocks. It is designed as a lightweight mechanism for monitoring the universe of available assets, either in aggregate or relative to each other. Metrics include Galaxy Score™, AltRank™, floor price, 24h percent change, market cap, social mentions, social interactions, social contributors, social dominance, and categories.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort the output by metric

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the number of results. Default is 10 maximum is 100 per page.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Pass any value as desc and the output will be reversed (descending)

parameters.name: page

changes.description: v2 includes market and social data with options to sort and limit by metrics
Logos now available for each entry
Includes sentiment data

description: Updates to potential changes to historical time series data. Search term changes only impact the most recent 72 hours (hourly) or 3 days (daily) data. "full historical" is a change that may impact the full history of data. Each change provides a description of what is impacted and why.

changes.description: Introducing public/system/changes endpoint to get a history of changes that may impact historical time series data for all time series endpoints.

description: Get the top creators for a social topic

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $.

changes.description: Introducing new topic creators endpoint to get the current list of trending social creators for a specific topic

description: Get the top news posts for a social topic. Top news is determined by the metrics related to the social posts that mention the news posts.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $.

changes.description: Introducing new topic news endpoint to get the top news posts for a specific topic.

description: Get the top posts for a social topic. If start time is provided the result will be the top posts by interactions for the time range. If start is not provided it will be the most recent top posts by interactions from the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to start at. Will be rounded to the beginning of the day. If the end parameter is not provided it will just be the top posts for this day.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: (Optional) The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at. Will be rounded to the end of the day.

changes.description: Introducing new topic posts endpoint to get the top social posts for a specific topic.
Now includes the creator avatar url
Sentiment is now included in the post object.
Post output now includes a link to the original post as key "post_link".
Start and end parameters added so you can fetch the top posts for a specific day or a range of days.
Added the primary image as post_image to the post object if available.

description: Get historical time series data for a social topic

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: bucket time series data into hours or days. default is hours.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Use interval to specify the start and end time automatically for convenience. If "start" or "end" parameters are provided this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time (unix timestamp) to go back to.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time (unix timestamp) to stop at.

changes.description: Introducing new topic time series endpoint to get various hourly or daily time series metrics for a topic.

description: Get summary information for a social topic. The output is a 24 hour aggregation social activity with metrics comparing the latest 24 hours to the previous 24 hours.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Provide the topic to get details for. A topic must be all lower case and can only include letters, numbers, spaces, # and $. You can also look up a topic by the coin/nft/stock numeric id like coins:1 for bitcoin or stocks:7056 for nVidia.

changes.description: More detailed sentiment information has been added to the topic detail outputs

description: Get a list of trending social topics.
